title: can not install lol

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
hi, i tried to install lol but i just cant, every time i lunch the luncher it say that it does not work and if microsoft find a solution it will let me know...i saw a few forum where they seem to have issues installing the game and they ask to see if they had windows x64 installed twice and if so to delete the second one and seem to work but since im a noob in pc i have no clue where to go or how to fix it, i found out that i have 2 time c++ install of many version and i have a screen shot of it, maye this is the reason why it does not work if so le tme know.

im on  a desktop windows 10

replies.body: The Visual C++ is a Windows component that you can obtain [manually](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387), but I recommend updating your Windows instead.  Doing so will make sure that everything is up to date and have necessary products to proceed with the install.  Also, your issue may not necessarily with Visual C++ unless the error specifically says that.  Let me know if you have a different error.

I have a simular error but when i try to install the game it stops working at about 60% ive already gotten in contact with a riot player support memeber but i havent heard back from them in almost 24 hours now. the riot member told me to make sure i had 8 gb of space free for the download so i checked my storage and made sure i had enough space and i did. i stil have this problem and i hope someone can understand and help me out <3.

At 60%, your patcher is communicating with the patching servers to download updates.  You can end up with an unspecified error if your connection is too weak to pull those updates.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection and get this fixed.  I hope that helps!
thank you for sending me this but im not sure what step i am needing to follow because i read them over and didnt see my problem.
